text: :For an Indian queen consort, see Yasomati. {{Use Indian English|date=April 2017} Yashomati Chandrakant Thakur (Sonawane) is a member of the 14th Maharashtra Legislative Assembly. She represents the Teosa Assembly Constituency. She belongs to the Indian National Congress. She was appointed as AICC Secretary for the party affairs in the Karnataka state. Yashomati Thakur was appointed AICC secretary for Amravati, Maharashtra, by Congress President Rahul Gandhi. Her appointment is a part of Gandhi's efforts to bring in youth in key positions in the party.Indian National Congress website: press release regarding appointment as AICC Secretary, 31 March 2018 Yashomati Thakur won for the third consecutive time from the Teosa assembly. She was sworn in as Cabinet Minister in Uddhav Thackeray lead Mahavikas Aghadi Government from Congress quota. == Guardian Minister of Amravati == Yashomati thakur is guardian minister of Amravati district ==Vidhansabha Talika President 2019 == She was appointed as Vidhansabha Talika President on 16 December 2019 by Nana Patole for winter session of Maharashtra Assembly held in Nagpur Vidarbha. ==References== ==External links== *Yashomati Thakur's official website Category:Members of the Maharashtra Legislative Assembly Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2014–2019 Category:People from Amravati district Category:Women in Maharashtra politics Category:Marathi politicians Category:Living people Category:Indian National Congress politicians from Maharashtra Category:21st-century Indian women politicians Category:21st- century Indian politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Yashomati Chandrakant Thakur
